mapper.insert: insert into ecs_ecsmart_article (article_id, cat_id, title, author, author_email, keywords, article_type, is_open, add_time, file_url, open_type, link, description, content) values (#{article_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{article_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{is_open,jdbcType=BIT}, #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{file_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{open_type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ecs_ecsmart_article set cat_id = #{cat_id,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author_email = #{author_email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, keywords = #{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, article_type = #{article_type,jdbcType=BIT}, is_open = #{is_open,jdbcType=BIT}, add_time = #{add_time,jdbcType=INTEGER}, file_url = #{file_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, open_type = #{open_type,jdbcType=BIT}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where article_id = #{article_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select article_id, cat_id, title, author, author_email, keywords, article_type, is_open, add_time, file_url, open_type, link, description, content from ecs_ecsmart_article where article_id = #{article_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
